languages.text: "Разумеется, я пытался выйти на связь и с другими {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольными Торговцами{/g}. Но условия династии Чорда выжали бы Футфол досуха, а от почтенного Каллигоса Винтерскейла вместо грузового корабля с провизией я получил транспорт "Навиика", набитый беженцами. Пришлось спровадить их на Фолстоун — появление стольких лишних ртов на станции лишь усугубило бы кризис. Предполагаю, волнения {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g} создали у него множество более насущных забот. Потому я рассчитываю на вас, как на треть{mf|его|ю} и последн{mf|его|юю} из возможных союзни{mf|ков|ц} Футфола".

traits.locale_text: "Разумеется, я пытался выйти на связь и с другими Вольными Торговцами. Но условия династии Чорда выжали бы Футфол досуха, а ответ от почтенного Калигоса Винтерскейла я ожидаю уже недопустимо долго. Предполагаю, волнения варпа создали у него множество более насущных забот. Потому я рассчитываю на вас, как на треть{mf|его|ю| и последн{mf|его|юю} из возможных союзни{mf|ков|ц| Футфола".

languages.text: "Naturally, I tried contacting other {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}. But the terms of House Chorda would have bled Footfall dry, and as for the esteemed Calligos Winterscale — instead of a food shipment from him, I received a transport, the Naviica, packed with refugees. I had to send them off to Foulstone — so many extra mouths to feed would have only worsened the crisis further. I suppose all these {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} fluctuations must have created more pressing concerns for Lord Winterscale. And so I put my faith in you, the third and last of Footfall's allies."
languages.original_text: "Разумеется, я пытался выйти на связь и с другими {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольными Торговцами{/g}. Но условия династии Чорда выжали бы Футфол досуха, а от почтенного Каллигоса Винтерскейла вместо грузового корабля с провизией я получил транспорт "Навиика", набитый беженцами. Предполагаю, волнения {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g} создали у него множество более насущных забот. Потому я рассчитываю на вас, как на треть{mf|его|ю} и последн{mf|его|юю} из возможных союзни{mf|ков|ц} Футфола".

traits.locale_text: "Naturally, I tried contacting other {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}. But the terms of House Chorda would have bled Footfall dry, and as for the esteemed Calligos Winterscale — instead of a food shipment from him, I received a transport, the Naviica, packed with refugees. I had to send them off to Foulstone — the appearance of so many extra mouths to feed would have only worsened the crisis further. I suppose all these {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} fluctuations must have created more pressing concerns for Lord Winterscale. And so I put my faith in you, the third and last of Footfall's allies."

I suppose all these {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} fluctuations must have created more pressing concerns for Lord Winterscale. And so I put my faith in you, the third and last of Footfall's allies."

languages.text: 「当然、他の{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}に連絡を試みたさ。しかし、チョーダ家が出したのはフットフォールを骨の髄までしゃぶり尽くす条件で、尊敬するカリゴス・ウィンタースケールに関しては…食糧の貨物を届ける代わりに、難民をパンパンに乗せたナヴィーカ号を受け入れろというものだった。どうしようもなくて難民はファウルストーンへ送ったよ。あまりに腹を空かせた者が増えれば、危機はさらにひどくなるばかりだ。{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}のあらゆるの変動が、ウィンタースケール卿にとって目の前の懸念を引き起こしたに違いない。だから私は君を信じた。フットフォールの3人目にして最後の協力者だ」
languages.original_text: "Naturally, I tried contacting other {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}. But the terms of House Chorda would have bled Footfall dry, and as for the esteemed Calligos Winterscale — instead of a food shipment from him, I received a transport, the Naviica, packed with refugees. I had to send them off to Foulstone — so many extra mouths to feed would have only worsened the crisis further. I suppose all these {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} fluctuations must have created more pressing concerns for Lord Winterscale. And so I put my faith in you, the third and last of Footfall's allies."

traits.locale_text: 「当然、他の{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}に連絡を試みたさ。しかし、チョーダ家が出したのはフットフォールを骨の髄までしゃぶり尽くす条件で、尊敬するカリゴス・ウィンタースケールに関しては…食糧の貨物を届ける代わりに、難民をパンパンに乗せたナヴィーカ号を受け入れろというものだった。どうしようもなくて難民はファウルストーンへ送ったよ。あまりに腹を空かせた者が増えれば、危機はさらにひどくなるばかりだ。{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}のあらゆるの変動が、ウィンタースケール卿にとって目の前の懸念を引き起こしたに違いない。だから私は君を信じた。フットフォールの3人目にして最後の協力者だ」

languages.text: “这是自然，我试着联系过其他{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}。不过，若是接受了库尔达的条款，落脚港恐怕就要被榨干了。至于受人尊敬的卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔……他送来的并不是食物，而是一艘载满了难民的运输船，纳维卡号。我不得不把他们送到荒寂岩地去，若是落脚港接纳这么多需要养活的人，恐怕只会让危机进一步恶化。我猜测，{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的波动一定让温特斯凯尔大人忙于更加紧迫的事情，无暇抽身。因此，我把希望寄托在了您的身上。您是落脚港的第三位盟友，也是最后一位盟友。”
languages.original_text: "Naturally, I tried contacting other {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}. But the terms of House Chorda would have bled Footfall dry, and as for the esteemed Calligos Winterscale — instead of a food shipment from him, I received a transport, the Naviica, packed with refugees. I had to send them off to Foulstone — so many extra mouths to feed would have only worsened the crisis further. I suppose all these {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} fluctuations must have created more pressing concerns for Lord Winterscale. And so I put my faith in you, the third and last of Footfall's allies."

traits.locale_text: “这是自然，我试着联系过其他{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}。不过，若是接受了库尔达的条款，落脚港恐怕就要被榨干了。至于受人尊敬的卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔……他送来的并不是食物，而是一艘载满了难民的运输船，纳维卡号。我不得不把他们送到荒寂岩地去，若是落脚港接纳这么多需要养活的人，恐怕只会让危机进一步恶化。我猜测，{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的波动一定让温特斯凯尔大人忙于更加紧迫的事情，无暇抽身。因此，我把希望寄托在了您的身上。您是落脚港的第三位盟友，也是最后一位盟友。”

languages.text: «Como cabe esperar, intenté contactar con otros {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes{/g}, pero las condiciones de la casa Chorda habrían dejado Paso sin nada. En cuanto al admirable Calligos Winterscale, en lugar del cargamento de alimentos, recibí una nave de carga, la Naviica, repleta de refugiados. Tuve que enviarlos a Rocainmunda; tantas bocas más que alimentar solo habrían empeorado aún más la crisis. Supongo que todas estas fluctuaciones de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} deben haber creado preocupaciones más apremiantes para lord Winterscale. Por eso confío en usted, {mf|el tercer y último aliado|la tercera y última aliada} de Paso».
languages.original_text: "Naturally, I tried contacting other {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}. But the terms of House Chorda would have bled Footfall dry, and as for the esteemed Calligos Winterscale — instead of a food shipment from him, I received a transport, the Naviica, packed with refugees. I had to send them off to Foulstone — so many extra mouths to feed would have only worsened the crisis further. I suppose all these {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} fluctuations must have created more pressing concerns for Lord Winterscale. And so I put my faith in you, the third and last of Footfall's allies."

traits.locale_text: «Como cabe esperar, intenté contactar con otros {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes{/g}, pero las condiciones de la casa Chorda habrían dejado Paso sin nada. En cuanto al admirable Calligos Winterscale, en lugar del cargamento de alimentos, recibí una nave de carga, la Naviica, repleta de refugiados. Tuve que enviarlos a Rocainmunda; tantas bocas más que alimentar solo habrían empeorado aún más la crisis. Supongo que todas estas fluctuaciones de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} deben haber creado preocupaciones más apremiantes para lord Winterscale. Por eso confío en usted, {mf|el tercer y último aliado|la tercera y última aliada} de Paso».

languages.text: « Naturellement, j'ai cherché à contacter d'autres {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libres-marchands{/g}, mais les conditions imposées par la maison Chorda auraient saigné Castel à blanc. Quant à l'honorable Calligos Winterscale, au lieu de nous faire parvenir de la nourriture, c'est un transport rempli de réfugiés qu'il nous a envoyé. J'ai dû les expédier à Rochepeste ; toutes ces nouvelles bouches à nourrir n'auraient fait qu'empirer la situation. J'imagine que les fluctuations du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} ont dû causer des ennuis plus pressants au seigneur Winterscale. Voilà pourquoi je suis contraint de m'appuyer sur vous, en tant que troisième et {mf|dernier allié|dernière alliée} de Castel. »
languages.original_text: "Naturally, I tried contacting other {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}. But the terms of House Chorda would have bled Footfall dry, and as for the esteemed Calligos Winterscale — instead of a food shipment from him, I received a transport, the Naviica, packed with refugees. I had to send them off to Foulstone — so many extra mouths to feed would have only worsened the crisis further. I suppose all these {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} fluctuations must have created more pressing concerns for Lord Winterscale. And so I put my faith in you, the third and last of Footfall's allies."

traits.locale_text: « Naturellement, j'ai cherché à contacter d'autres {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libres-marchands{/g}, mais les conditions imposées par la maison Chorda auraient saigné Castel à blanc. Quant à l'honorable Calligos Winterscale, au lieu de nous faire parvenir de la nourriture, c'est un transport rempli de réfugiés qu'il nous a envoyé. J'ai dû les expédier à Rochepeste ; toutes ces nouvelles bouches à nourrir n'auraient fait qu'empirer la situation. J'imagine que les fluctuations du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} ont dû causer des ennuis plus pressants au seigneur Winterscale. Voilà pourquoi je suis contraint de m'appuyer sur vous, en tant que troisième et {mf|dernier allié|dernière alliée} de Castel. »

languages.text: "Natürlich habe ich versucht, auch andere {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} zu kontaktieren. Aber die Bedingungen des Hauses Chorda hätten Footfall ausbluten lassen, und was den geschätzten Calligos Winterzunder angeht – statt einer Lebensmittellieferung erhielt ich von ihm einen Transporter, die Naviica, randvoll mit Flüchtlingen. Ich musste sie nach Foulstone weiterschicken – so viele hungrige Mäuler hätten die Krise nur verschlimmert. Vermutlich haben die {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Fluktuationen dringlichere Probleme für Lord Winterzunder geschaffen. Und darum lege ich nun mein Vertrauen in Euch, Footfalls dritten und letzten Verbündeten."
languages.original_text: "Naturally, I tried contacting other {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}. But the terms of House Chorda would have bled Footfall dry, and as for the esteemed Calligos Winterscale — instead of a food shipment from him, I received a transport, the Naviica, packed with refugees. I had to send them off to Foulstone — so many extra mouths to feed would have only worsened the crisis further. I suppose all these {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} fluctuations must have created more pressing concerns for Lord Winterscale. And so I put my faith in you, the third and last of Footfall's allies."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich habe ich versucht, auch andere {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} zu kontaktieren. Aber die Bedingungen des Hauses Chorda hätten Footfall ausbluten lassen, und was den geschätzten Calligos Winterzunder angeht – statt einer Lebensmittellieferung erhielt ich von ihm einen Transporter, die Naviica, randvoll mit Flüchtlingen. Ich musste sie nach Foulstone weiterschicken – so viele hungrige Mäuler hätten die Krise nur verschlimmert. Vermutlich haben die {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Fluktuationen dringlichere Probleme für Lord Winterzunder geschaffen. Und darum lege ich nun mein Vertrauen in Euch, Footfalls dritten und letzten Verbündeten."

languages.text: "Diğer {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacirler{/g} ile de iletişime geçmeyi denedim tabii lakin Chorda Hanesi'nin şartları, Binliman'ın iliğini kurutacak cinstendi. Saygın Calligos Winterscale'den ise yiyecek sevkiyatı yerine mültecilerle dolu nakliye gemisi Naviica'yı aldım. Mültecileri Menfurtaş'a göndermek zorunda kaldım. Beslenecek boğaz sayısının artması krizi daha da kötüleştirirdi. Tüm bu {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} dalgalanmaları, Lord Winterscale için daha acil endişeler yaratmış olmalı. Hâl böyle olunca Binliman'ın üç müttefikinden geriye kalan sizin kapınıza geldim."
languages.original_text: "Naturally, I tried contacting other {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}. But the terms of House Chorda would have bled Footfall dry, and as for the esteemed Calligos Winterscale — instead of a food shipment from him, I received a transport, the Naviica, packed with refugees. I had to send them off to Foulstone — so many extra mouths to feed would have only worsened the crisis further. I suppose all these {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} fluctuations must have created more pressing concerns for Lord Winterscale. And so I put my faith in you, the third and last of Footfall's allies."

traits.locale_text: "Diğer {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}ler ile de iletişime geçmeyi denedim tabii lakin Chorda Hanesi'nin şartları Binliman'ın iliğini kuruturdu, saygın Calligos Winterscale'den ise yiyecek sevkiyatı yerine mültecilerle dolu bir nakliye aracı olan Naviica'yı aldım. Mültecileri Menfurtaş'a göndermek zorunda kaldım, beslenecek boğaz sayısının artması krizi daha da kötüleştirirdi. Tüm bu {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} dalgalanmaları, Lord Winterscale için daha acil endişeler yaratmış olmalı. İşte böylece Binliman'ın müttefiklerinin üçüncü ve sonuncusu olan sizin kapınıza geldim."
